task.title: Modify an Existing General Comment for an Activity

step.cmd: Select the tab that includes the activity for which you want to modify an existing general comment.
Select , and then select Add/Edit Comment for the activity.
In the window for entering general comments, select the General check box to filter comments in the existing comments list by the general type.
step.stepresult: All general comments appear in the existing comments list in the window for entering comments.

step.cmd: Select for an existing general comment.
step.stepresult: The EDIT GENERAL COMMENT box appears, displaying the current comment.

step.cmd: Modify the comment, and then select Save.

info.note: The position of a comment in the comments list remains constant even if you modify the comment later.

step.stepresult: An informational message stating that the comment was successfully modified appears in the Open page.

taskbody.result: The changes to the general comment are saved.
